description: Bodycam video of the killing of Sonya Massey, a Black woman who sought the help of authorities, was released Monday. The deputy who shot the woman has been charged with three counts of murder. Roxana Saberi has the details.
title: Illinois deputy charged with murder in shooting of Sonya Massey

description: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle faced calls to resign Monday during a contentious hearing following the attempted assassination of Republican presidential nominee and former President Donald Trump. Scott MacFarlane has more.
title: Secret Service director on Capitol Hill following Trump assassination attempt

description: Biden aides have some bitterness about how the president's campaign ended and Republicans are saying he's unfit to stay in office. Ed O'Keefe has more details.
title: How President Biden's camp is reacting to the end of the campaign, plus Republican's reaction

description: Vice President Harris will have to make a decision soon over who to add on her ticket for a Democratic campaign. Robert Costa has analysis on who she could choose.
title: Who could Vice President Kamala Harris choose as her running mate?

description: A slew of endorsements and a significant amount of campaign donations have come into Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign one full day after President Biden said he would not be running for re-election. Weijia Jiang has more.
title: Support for Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign growing

description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Evening News with Norah O'Donnell."
title: "CBS Evening News" headlines for Monday, July 22, 2024

description: Federal safety regulators are looking into complaints that some Ram pickups and Jeep Wagoneer SUVs can lose power, shift into park and apply the emergency brake.
title: Jeep and Ram vehicles under investigation by feds

description: A Missouri judge on Monday overturned the conviction of Christopher Dunn, who has spent more than 30 years in prison for a killing he has long contended he didn't commit.​
title: Missouri judge overturns wrongful conviction of Christopher Dunn

description: President Biden called in Monday to speak with Harris campaign staffers in Delaware. They were his first public remarks since dropping out of the 2024 presidential race. CBS News senior White House and political correspondent Ed O'Keefe reports.
title: Biden calls into Harris campaign event in 1st remarks since exiting race

description: In "Bart to the Future," Lisa Simpson replaces Donald Trump as president, wearing an outfit that is eerily similar to Kamala Harris' inauguration suit.
title: "The Simpsons" writer comments on Kamala Harris predictions: "I'm proud"

description: Google said it won't phase out third-party cookies in its Chrome browser after all, opting to let people "make an informed choice."
title: Google reneges on plan to remove third-party cookies in Chrome

description: Many Democrats believe Biden's exit from the campaign will improve chances of beating Trump in November.
title: Poll: Many Democrats back Harris, feel election chances improved after Biden exit

description: Bodycam video of the fatal shooting of Sonya Massey was released Monday afternoon. The video shows the chaotic scene after a sheriff's deputy shot Massey, who is Black, in the face during a tense moment over a pot of water in her home.
title: Officials release video of officer fatally shooting Sonya Massey in her home after she called 911

description: Maya Rudolph played Harris several times as a guest on "SNL" in 2019, during the 2020 presidential election cycle.
title: Calls grow for Maya Rudolph to reprise Kamala Harris on "SNL"

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is in Wilmington, Delaware, where she will address workers at President Biden's campaign headquarters Monday. This comes as endorsements and donations trickle in for Harris after Mr. Biden's announcement that he would be dropping out of the 2024 presidential race. Senior White House correspondent Weijia Jiang reports.
title: Harris in Delaware as campaign earns key endorsements, donations

description: Vice President Kamala Harris' presidential campaign said the $81 million raised is record-breaking.
title: Harris campaign raised $81 million in 24 hours after Biden dropped out

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will have to choose a running mate soon.
title: Who could Kamala Harris pick as her VP? Here are 10 potential running mates

description: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle testified before the House Oversight Committee Monday on her agency's failure to secure the space where former President Donald Trump was targeted by an armed man during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania. CBS News congressional correspondent Scott MacFarlane has more on the ongoing investigations into the assassination attempt.
title: Secret Service director grilled over Trump assassination attempt

description: Settling your credit card debt could be a wise move in today's high-rate environment. Here's why.
title: 3 big reasons to pursue credit card debt forgiveness this August

description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear, Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer and Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly are among the names being floated as potential running mate picks for Vice President Kamala Harris' 2024 campaign. Chuck Rocha, a Democratic party strategist, and Kevin Sheridan, a Republican party strategist, join CBS News with a look at Harris' potential VP considerations.
title: Who could Harris consider for 2024 campaign VP pick?

description: The price of gold just hit another record high. Here are three things investors should do now.
title: Gold prices keep rising. Here's how to take advantage now.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris delivers remarks at the White House; Voter reactions to President Biden dropping out of 2024 race.
title: 7/22: CBS News 24/7 Episode 2

description: These are the best and worst states to retire in the U.S., based on key metrics like affordability and access to quality health care.
title: This state was named the best place to retire in the U.S.

description: Actor Aubrey Plaza suffered a torn ACL before attending the anticipated WNBA All-Star game in Phoenix over the weekend, a commentator said.
title: Aubrey Plaza tore her ACL before attending the WNBA All-Star game

description: Vice President Kamala Harris' platform for the 2024 presidential race may not differ much from President Biden's main running points, but it may reflect differing takes on some of the country's top issues, such as women's reproductive rights and the Israel-Hamas war. CBS News chief White House correspondent Nancy Cordes reports.
title: What Harris' platform may look like for 2024 presidential race

description: A look at President Biden's legacy after he became the first presumptive nominee to give up the nomination at this point in the campaign.
title: Joe Biden's legacy after historic decision to give up 2024 reelection campaign

description: Shop deals on laptops that'll save you hundreds on popular brands like Asus, Acer, Razer and more.

description: Print, copy, scan and even fax with these feature-rich printers that can really make a difference in the fall.
title: The 6 best all-in-one printers for 2024 are must-haves for students

description: House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries did not announce a Democratic nomination endorsement while speaking to reporters on Capitol Hill a day after President Biden announced he was dropping out of the 2024 race. Jeffries announced he will be meeting with Vice President Kamala Harris, Mr. Biden's choice for the Democratic nomination, along with Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer. CBS News' Nikole Killion has the latest.
title: Jeffries meeting with Harris, doesn't announce endorsement

description: At least four states have already committed delegates to Vice President Kamala Harris after President Biden announced that he was dropping out of the 2024 race. CBS News investigative reporter Dan Klaidman breaks down the process to secure delegates for the Democratic nomination.
title: States begin committing delegates to Harris campaign

description: Discover if you should upgrade to the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 6 folding Android smartphone.

description: Nancy Pelosi, the former speaker of the House of Representatives, has officially endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the Democratic nomination after President Biden dropped out of the 2024 race Sunday. CBS News' Caitlin Huey-Burns reports.
title: Pelosi endorses Harris for 2024 Democratic nomination

description: Voters in battleground states such as Arizona, Pennsylvania and Michigan are reacting to the news of President Biden dropping out of the 2024 race. CBS News' Elise Preston is following voter reaction in key states after Mr. Biden endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the Democratic nomination.
title: Voters in battleground states react to Biden exit, Harris endorsement

description: When asked to react to news of a shuffle in the Democratic ticket for president, former President Donald Trump told CBS News that Vice President Kamala Harris is "no better" than President Biden. CBS News political director Fin Gomez is following the Trump campaign's reaction to the latest twist in the 2024 race.
title: How Trump is reacting to Harris campaign news

description: Several notable Democratic lawmakers on Capitol Hill are beginning to publicly endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for the 2024 Democratic nomination less than 24 hours since President Biden dropped out of the race. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion has more.
title: Democrats endorse Harris for 2024 race nomination

description: Vice President Kamala Harris said she is "deeply, deeply grateful" to President Biden for his service to the nation during her first public remarks since Mr. Biden dropped out of the 2024 presidential race and endorsed her for the Democratic nomination. CBS News senior White House and political correspondent Ed O'Keefe reports.
title: Harris praises Biden in first remarks after president drops out of 2024 race

description: The physical gold market isn't immune to fraud. Here's how to make sure your gold bars are not counterfeit.

description: Economists and investors assess the impact of Biden's decision to withdraw from U.S. presidential race on everything from economy to stock market.

description: Animated versions of 20 U.S. Olympian break dancers, skateboarders and others will be featured on the popular online game in hopes of attracting young fans to the international sports competition.

description: CBS News contributor David Begnaud surprises his former teacher and mentor, who has made an impact on countless lives through her decades in the classroom.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris spoke Monday at the White House for the first time since President Biden announced he would end his reelection campaign and endorse Harris for president. Tony Dokoupil anchored CBS News' special report on Harris' address.
title: Watch: VP Kamala Harris makes first remarks since Biden's exit from 2024 race

description: Be ready for the new school year with an affordable HP printer from Best Buy.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is looking likely to receive the Democratic Party's nomination for president following President Biden's closure of his reelection campaign and endorsement of Harris. CBS News chief White House correspondent Nancy Cordes has more on the endorsements and donations pouring in for Harris and Democratic strategists Joel Payne and Ashley Etienne joined CBS News to talk about Harris' strategy moving forward.
title: What will Vice President Kamala Harris' strategy be as she runs for president?

description: The rescue team called it "truly a miracle" that the hiker survived so long without food or water.
title: Hiker missing for 2 weeks found alive after rescuers hear cry for help

description: Rep. Mark Pocan, a Democrat from Wisconsin and co-chair of the Congressional Progressive Caucus PAC, joined CBS News to discuss President Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign and endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for president.
title: Rep. Mark Pocan on Vice President Kamala Harris' presidential run

description: Delta canceled more flights than any other U.S. airline Monday as it struggles to recover from CrowdStrike outage.

description: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro has been floated as a potential running mate for Vice President Kamala Harris, should she receive the Democratic nomination for president. CBS News Pittsburgh reporter Jon Delano has more.

description: Multiple factors can affect your home equity loan. Here are four critical ones that experts say to watch for.

description: U.S. Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle is testifying before the House Oversight Committee over her agency's actions surrounding the assassination attempt against former President Donald Trump. Following Cheatle's opening statement and the start of questions, CBS News national security contributor Samantha Vinograd offered insight into Cheatle's testimony.
title: Watch: Secret Service director's opening statement to Congress about Trump shooting

description: President Biden announced he is dropping his bid for reelection, upending the presidential race and sending shockwaves through the political world. Also, the president endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris, now the frontrunner for the Democratic nomination. All that and all that matters in today's Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: President Biden drops out of 2024 race, endorses Kamala Harris as nominee

description: West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin, a former Democrat turned Independent, said he will not run for president for the Democratic presidential nomination after President Biden dropped out of the race Sunday. Manchin did advocate for some type of contested primary as Vice President Kamala Harris has emerged as the frontrunner.
title: West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin says he won't run for president, advocates for "mini primary"

description: A court in Russia has sentenced journalist Alsu Kurmasheva, a dual U.S.-Russian national, to prison after a completely closed trial.
title: Russia sentences another U.S. journalist to prison after closed trial

description: Former President Donald Trump and other Republicans are still reacting to Sunday's announcement that President Biden is ending his reelection campaign and endorsing Vice President Kamala Harris for president. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez has more.
title: Trump says Harris could be "far less competent" than Biden

description: President Biden dropped out of the 2024 race​ on Sunday and endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris for the Democratic nomination​.
title: Harris in first remarks since Biden dropped out says she's "deeply grateful" to him

description: These pigs breathe air and drink water that's better filtered against contaminants than what's required for people. Even their feed gets disinfected.
title: Meet the pigs raised to grow kidneys and hearts for humans

description: Lightning struck repeatedly as the men descended from the summit and the 18-year-old suffered a fatal electric shock, police said.
title: Teen killed by lightning strike on Germany's highest peak

description: Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle is testifying before the House Oversight Committee Monday about the agency's actions around the assassination attempt made on former President Donald Trump. CBS News Homeland Security and Justice reporter Nicole Sganga has more.
title: Secret Service chief testifying before House about Trump assassination attempt

description: A security camera recorded the killing, inside the bedroom they shared in Humboldt, Tennessee, the county prosecutor said.
title: Girl accused of smothering 8-year-old cousin to death over iPhone

description: The murders marked the latest in a series of attacks targeting police, activists and politicians across Mexico.
title: Police chief shot dead days after activist, wife and daughter killed in Mexico

description: The Trump campaign has said it asked for extra security and was denied.
title: Secret Service admits some security modifications for Trump "not provided" before rally

description: From 2023, Scott Pelley's interview with President Biden, days after the October 7th attack in Israel. From 2022, Pelley's talk with Biden about the war in Ukraine and that year's midterm elections. From 2020, Norah O'Donnell's interview with then-candidate Biden and his running mate Kamala Harris. From 2019, O'Donnell's chat with candidate Biden during his primary campaign. From 2015, O'Donnell's interview with then-Vice President Biden about his decision not to run in the 2016 election. From 2009, Lesley Stahl's sit-down with Biden about his and President Obama's first 100 days in office. And from 2008, Steve Kroft's look at the Obama-Biden ticket.
title: President Joe Biden on 60 Minutes through the years | 60 Minutes Full Episodes

description: On this edition of 'The Takeout," Major Garrett heads to Milwaukee to cover the 2024 Republican National Convention. His  guests include former presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy, Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, Milwaukee County Executive David Crowley, and former Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker.
title: 7/21: The Takeout: Major heads to Milwaukee

description: Voters in Arizona reacted Sunday to President Biden's decision to end his reelection campaign and endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for the Democratic nomination. CBS News producer Elizabeth Campbell has more from Arizona, and Democratic strategist Joel Payne joins with analysis.
title: Arizona voters react to Biden dropping out, Kamala Harris seeking Democratic nomination

description: President Biden ended his reelection campaign Sunday, less than four months before Election Day. Democrats now face an unprecedented process to replace him on the party's ticket. CBS News' John Dickerson, Willie James Inman, Nancy Cordes, Nikole Killion and Margaret Brennan report on Biden's historic decision.
title: Biden drops reelection bid, upending 2024 race

description: CBS News campaign reporter Nidia Cavazos has been following Vice President Kamala Harris throughout the 2024 campaign season. Cavazos has more on how voters have responded to Harris at her events.
title: How Kamala Harris is received on campaign trail

description: Vice President Kamala Harris has received a barrage of endorsements following President Biden's announcement that he would end his reelection campaign, but she's not necessarily a lock for the Democratic nomination for president. CBS News congressional correspondent Scott MacFarlane has more.
title: Could Joe Manchin or others challenge Harris for Democratic nomination?

description: President Biden announced Sunday that he is no longer running for reelection in 2024. Nancy Cordes has the latest on the historic decision.
title: President Biden bows out of 2024 race in historic decision

description: Presidential historian Douglas Brinkley joined CBS News to discuss how history might remember President Biden's decision to end his 2024 campaign and what kind of precedent there is for the move Biden and the Democrats are embarking on.
title: The historic implications of Biden's decision to end reelection campaign

description: President Biden's announcement that he is dropping out of the 2024 presidential race leaves several questions unanswered about the state of the election. Robert Costa and Margaret Brennan explain what will happen moving forward.
title: What happens now that Biden has dropped out?

description: While it's not a guarantee Vice President Kamala Harris will grab the Democratic nomination after President Biden's withdrawal, she quickly earned key endorsements, including from the president. Weijia Jiang looks at some of the likely contenders Harris could pick as her running mate.
title: Who could be the Democratic running mate?

description: President Biden's announcement to end his reelection campaign Sunday drew reactions from leaders around the world. CBS News' Ian Lee has more.
title: World leaders react to Biden exiting 2024 presidential race

description: Former President Donald Trump's campaign and the Republican Party will have to shift their strategy after President Biden's historic decision to exist the presidential race. CBS News political correspondent Caitlin Huey-Burns has more on the GOP strategy and Democratic strategist Chuck Rocha discusses what's next for the Democratic Party.
title: How Trump campaign is shifting its strategy with Biden out of race

description: Reactions are coming out in Washington and across the country to Sunday's announcement that President Biden would end his reelection campaign and endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for 2024. CBS News political director Fin Gomez has more.
title: Voters react to Biden dropping out, Harris says she doesn't want a coronation

description: President Biden's announcement he would withdraw from the 2024 race came amid slipping poll numbers. Jim Axelrod takes a look at how voters are reacting to the decision.
title: How voters are reacting to Biden dropping out

description: President Biden's announcement at age 81 that he will drop out of the 2024 race all but assures he will be a one-term president. Major Garrett takes a look at Mr. Biden's legacy and how the decision to bow out of the race affects it.
title: A look at Biden's legacy after he dropped out of 2024 race

description: President Biden announcing he is dropping out of the 2024 race just weeks before the Democratic National Convention in Chicago could lead to a messy convention. CBS News contributor and former senior advisor to Mr. Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris Ashley Etienne and Republican political strategist Terry Sullivan discuss what may happen in the coming weeks.
title: Examining the fallout of Biden dropping out

description: John Dickerson joins "CBS Evening News" to examine what comes next now that President Biden has dropped out of the 2024 race.
title: John Dickerson on Biden dropping out

description: Rep. Jamie Raskin was one of the key Democratic lawmakers calling on President Biden to drop out of the 2024 race. He joined the "CBS Evening News" to discuss his reaction to Mr. Biden's announcement and what he would like to see moving forward.
title: Rep. Jamie Raskin on Biden dropping out

description: Former President Donald Trump is still reacting to Sunday's news that President Biden is ending his 2024 campaign and endorsing Vice President Kamala Harris for the Oval Office. CBS News national correspondent Manuel Bojorquez has more on what Trump's been saying on social media and what his campaign strategy could be moving forward.
title: Trump likely to portray Democrats as party in disarray after Biden drops out

description: President Biden ended his candidacy amid growing calls from some Democrats to step aside as the 2024 election nears. Cecilia Vega has the latest on the race.
title: President Biden ends 2024 election candidacy | 60 Minutes

description: President Biden made the decision to drop out of the 2024 race while dealing with a COVID-19 infection at his vacation home in Rehoboth, Delaware. Willie Inman has the details on why Mr. Biden decided to withdraw from the race.
title: How Biden decided to drop out of 2024 race

description: President Biden announced Sunday he was dropping out of the 2024 presidential race and endorsing Vice President Kamala Harris to lead the Democratic ticket. Nancy Cordes has the latest.
title: President Biden drops out of 2024 race after weeks of pressure

description: Danielle Alvarez, a senior adviser for the Trump campaign, says they "have been prepared for Kamala Harris or any sort of switch in the ticket" since the June debate between President Biden and former President Donald Trump. Alvarez joins CBS News with her reaction to President Biden's withdrawal from the 2024 presidential election.
title: Trump campaign has been prepared for switch in the Democratic ticket since debate, adviser says

description: As Democratic lawmakers praise President Biden following his decision to end his reelection bid, some Republicans are calling for him to resign from the presidency. CBS News congressional correspondent Nikole Killion has more on reactions from Capitol Hill.
title: How Democratic, Republican lawmakers are reacting to Biden dropping out of 2024 race

description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Evening News with Norah O'Donnell."
title: "CBS Evening News" headlines for Sunday, July 21, 2024

description: A program from the creator of the oral history project "StoryCorps" is asking Americans with opposing political ideals to do the seemingly impossible: talk with each other. Norah O'Donnell reports.
title: Bridging America's political divide with conversations

description: Lesley Stahl and 60 Minutes producer Shari Finkelstein took a unique approach to their story, capturing the raw emotions of crime victims and wrongfully convicted men during a three-day retreat.
title: Capturing the emotional journey of Healing Justice

description: A rape survivor, guilt ridden after learning that an innocent man had been sent to prison in her case, brings together crime victims and exonerees to help heal those impacted by wrongful convictions.
title: Crime victims form unlikely bonds with wrongfully convicted men

description: More than 15 years after meeting Gary Lakin and Allison Oleszkowicz, best-selling author Jason Reynolds recalls their story of tragedy and joy.
title: Love, loss, and life; the StoryCorps session Jason Reynolds never forgot

description: A program from the creator of the oral history project "StoryCorps" is asking Americans with opposing political ideals to do the seemingly impossible: talk with each other. Norah O'Donnell reports.
title: Oral history project records conversations between people with opposing political views

description: A rape survivor, guilt ridden after learning that an innocent man had been sent to prison in her case, brings together crime victims and exonerees to help heal those impacted by wrongful convictions.
title: Exonerees, crime survivors come together for healing | 60 Minutes

description: President Biden ended his reelection bid weeks before the Democratic National Convention, which is set to kick off Aug. 19 in Chicago.
title: What is an open convention?

description: It's been a whirlwind several weeks after President Biden's poor debate performance against former President Donald Trump. "60 Minutes" correspondent Cecilia Vega as a closer look at the events leading up to Mr. Biden's decision to drop out of the 2024 presidential election on Sunday.
title: Timeline of events leading up to Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 race

description: President Biden endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris as the Democratic presidential nominee after announcing he is exiting the 2024 race. Ed Gordon looks at her life and career.
title: What to know about Kamala Harris as she becomes top contender for Democratic nomination

description: Virginia Sen. Tim Kaine, who was Hillary Clinton's running mate in 2016, offered his advice to Vice President Kamala Harris as she builds up her campaign to become the Democratic presidential nominee following President Biden's decision to end his reelection bid.
title: Sen. Tim Kaine on his advice for Kamala Harris after Biden dropped out of 2024 race

description: President Biden's announcement to drop out of the 2024 presidential race marked a historic moment in his decades-long career in politics. CBS News chief Washington correspondent Major Garrett takes a look back.
title: A look at Biden's decades-long political career

description: Vice President Kamala Harris spoke with 60 Minutes' Bill Whitaker in October about Israel, Ukraine, and the 2024 presidential election. At the time, Harris said she had "no doubt" that she and President Joe Biden would win the race against former President Donald Trump. On Sunday, President Biden announced that he was exiting the race and formally endorsed Harris to be the Democratic Party's presidential nominee.
title: Vice President Kamala Harris | 60 Minutes Archive

description: Sen. Chris Murphy of Connecticut says he believes Americans will be surprised by the Vice President Kamala Harris they will see in the next few weeks and months. He joins CBS News to talk about Biden's decision to withdraw from the 2024 presidential election and more.
title: Sen. Chris Murphy says he believes Kamala Harris will be an "incredibly effective messenger"
